meanings.definition: Resembling or having the consistency of gum.
meanings.sent1: The gummous substance was so sticky that it got stuck to my fingers.
meanings.sent2: The candy became gummous after being left out in the sun.
meanings.sent3: The gummous glue held the pieces together like magic.
meanings.sent4: Her gummous hands clung to the railing as she climbed the stairs.
meanings.sent5: The gummous texture of the slime made it fun to play with.

meanings.sent1: The gummous tape kept the poster securely on the wall.
meanings.sent2: The spilled syrup left a gummous residue on the table.
meanings.sent3: The gummous stickers were difficult to remove from the paper.
meanings.sent4: His gummous shoes left marks on the freshly mopped floor.
meanings.sent5: The gummous sap from the tree trapped insects within its grasp.
